name: Cecil Day-Lewis
summary: Cecil Day-Lewis. Writer: The Beast Must Die. Cecil Day-Lewis was born on 27 April 1904 in Ballintubber, Ireland. He was a writer, known for The Beast Must Die (1952), This Man Must Die (1969) and The Beast Must Die (2021). He was previously married to Jill Balcon and Constance Mary King. He died on 22 May 1972 in London, England, UK.
